content: **fab 50 scarf-** *a beginner level scarf pattern to warm up your winter in celebration of estelle yarns 50th anniversary a family-owned canadian company founded by iris and phillip peacock in 1976 that became the building blocks of the canadian retail yarn industry * just one 100g ball of estelle yarns 50 is all you will need to knit this simple scarf completely reversible and so incredibly soft you may want to rest your head on it aahhh sweet knitting dreams
